WorkItem.Description: Given the comment from discussions about the over-value of The BlackHeart trinket drop, I realize that I'd only had a very simple implementation of special effects of items and talents.  Time to make this more robust.

Comments.Message: So it is over-valued then? It wasnt just blizzard making a trinket too good by accident?

He's not saying that, he's saying he needs to review the special effects handling in TankDK and see if he can't make it better handle things. If he can it may change the value, up or down for that and other trinkets.

Completed: At revision: 37568  

Made some adjustments to the way I deal w/ Special effects.  
The Black Heart is still rated as a very good trinket, however, it's all dependent upon the severity of the incoming raw damage.  If that goes up, the value of this trinket goes down because Mitigation becomes more important than raw Survivability.
